author: Peter Goff
title: China bars entry by almost all foreigners in effort to slow virus
description: China will temporarily bar entry to returning foreigners with valid visas and residence permits and will drastically cut international flight routes, in a bid to stave off a second wave of coronavirus infections. Seeking to curb the number of imported Covid-1…
content:
China will temporarily bar entry to returning foreigners with valid visas and residence permits and will drastically cut international flight routes, in a bid to stave off a second wave of coronavirus infections.
